description:
From our main law office in McHenry, Illinois, the dedicated legal professionals at Donahue & Walsh, P.C. represent the rights and interests of clients across our region who suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Focusing on personal injury and wrongful death claims, we have achieved notable success advocating on behalf of those adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, dangerous property conditions, dog bites and other preventable tragedies. In addition, we also handle workers' compensation claims and appeals as well as third-party claims for those who suffered a debilitating injury on the job.

Over the course of our history, our law firm's attorneys have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients, and we have earned a reputation for delivering highly compassionate, personalized counsel while aggressively pursuing the most favorable outcomes possible for those we serve.

We fully understand the tactics insurance providers use to deny claims, and we promise to fight hard on your behalf to help increase your chances of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you need to cover your medical bills, lost wages and other associated damages.

As further evidence of our success, our law firm has grown to include branch offices in Elgin and Rockford, so you are never far away from the exceptional and effective representation you need. For more information on how we can best serve you and your family at this difficult time in your life, you can contact Donahue & Walsh, P.C. to schedule a free initial consultation.
